---
title: "sina 图"
date: "2024-11-02"
date-modified: today
categories: [graphics, ggplot2 extension]
---


（小提琴图 + 抖散图）= sina 图





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggforce)


ggplot(mpg,aes(x = drv, y = hwy ))+
    geom_sina()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](sina_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(mpg,aes(x = drv, y = hwy ))+
    geom_violin()+
    geom_jitter(width = 0.25, size = 0.85)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](sina_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
